starkcoder.failfast.contractors

Class ACallContractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • starkcoder.failfast.contractors.ACallContractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICallContractor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CallContractor

    public abstract class ACallContractor
extends Object
implements ICallContractor
    Abstract implementation of ICallContractor.

    The purpose of this is to ease the burden of concrete implementations.

    To extend this in a concrete implementation is optional.

    Author:
    Keld Oelykke

    • Method Detail

      • pushContractWithCaller

        public void pushContractWithCaller(ICallContract callContract)
        Description copied from interface: ICallContractor
        Starts a {link:ICallContract} between caller and call contractor.

        Argument checkSpecification is annotated with a matching fail specification that needs to be employed by the caller to end the contract.

        Specified by:
        pushContractWithCaller in interface ICallContractor
        Parameters:
        callContract - contract data created by asserting check-method.

      • popContractWithCaller

        public ICallContract popContractWithCaller(Object caller,
                                  IFailer throwingFailer,
                                  Class<? extends IFail> failSpecification)
        Description copied from interface: ICallContractor
        Ends a contract between caller and call contractor.

        Argument failSpecification is annotated with a matching check specification that was employed by the caller to start the contract.

        Specified by:
        popContractWithCaller in interface ICallContractor
        Parameters:
        caller - instance that called a checker and needs to call a failer
        throwingFailer - failer that was called to throw an exception
        failSpecification - fail specification type inhering by IFail
        Returns:
        checker pushed user arguments and extra arguments
